The drag readout is horrible. You have a bunch of lines coming out of the general back of your craft, and it very hard to tell which parts they actually come from. Please make it where parts are shaded with their drag, or at least make it where the drag line of a part you mouse over lights up.

Thank you for your time.

Sincerely, Quasarr.
While you are at it, please move it off the steam screenshot key. Thanks.
